ai.summary: Green Trail is a short, easy hike in the UK, about 1.8 km round trip. The trail is flat and well-marked, making it suitable for families, beginners, and casual walkers.
ai.terrain_summary: Generally flat with a well-maintained path, light gravel in sections, and occasional grassy verges. Some sections may be muddy after rain.
ai.safety_notes: Check the forecast before you go, wear sturdy shoes, stay on marked trails, and bring water. Be prepared for sudden UK weather changes and shorter daylight hours in winter; tell someone your plan and carry a phone with emergency contacts.
recommended_gear: Weatherproof jacket (waterproof if rain is expected)
Map or fully charged smartphone with offline map
ai.best_seasons: Spring to Autumn (roughly March–October); the trail is typically most comfortable and dry during these months, though it can be walked year-round with suitable footwear.

seo.title: Green Trail – 1.8 km Easy Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover a short, easy 1.8 km hike on the Green Trail in the UK. Flat, well-marked, and family-friendly.
